note: I first fell in love with Chris Colfer and Darren Criss on Glee. Their chemistry was amazing and at that time, I thought, "It would be awesome if they were a real couple." I didn't know until many years later that there were people who thought like me. Nothing about the beard made sense to me. Chris and Darren could be a HUGE power couple, and would be if they were allowed. I found likeminded people on tumblr after I began reading fanfics. Lately, it's become too toxic for me...so here I am!
